common.title: I was born
common.description: And my birthday is the 12th of July which makes me 29 years old.

professional.title: I begin studying Computer Science Engineering
professional.subtitle: Technical University of Denmark
professional.description: During my studies I was very social and outgoing. I was part of coordinating the study start, president for the student council for math and software students and I even received a reward for my efforts in the Social sector of Polyteknisk Forening (PF).

professional.title: Teaching Assistant
professional.subtitle: Technical University of Denmark
professional.description: Assisted students in the course 02170 - Database Systems with understanding the curriculum in order to solve the course exercises. Furthermore, I evaluated assignments and provided feedback on slides/teaching material for the lecturer.

professional.title: I become a BSc Engineering
professional.subtitle: Technical University of Denmark
professional.description: My interest for Machine Learning starting during my second year where i worked with Restricted Boltzman Machines, Autoencoders and Multilayer perceptrons and my Bachelor project studied the potential use of Recurrent Neural Networks for predicting constructiveness of feedback.

professional.title: Analyst
professional.subtitle: Netcompany
professional.description: I primarily worked with one of the largest social benefits IT systems in Denmark during my time as an Analyst at Netcompany. My work was focused on developing business logic code in java occasionally also writing SQL statements and fixing bugs.

professional.title: Teaching Assistant
professional.subtitle: Technical University of Denmark
professional.description: I assisted DTU students in the course 02806 - Social Data Analysis and Visualization with Python coding, Javascript coding and visualization theory. Furthermore, I evaluated assignments in collaboration with the other teaching assistants and the lecturer. I also provided feedback on the teaching material.

professional.title: I get my Masters Degree in Digital Media Engineering (MSc)
professional.subtitle: Technical University of Denmark
professional.description: I specialized in data processing, data analysis and machine learning. During my thesis, we created DanSpeech, a state-of-the-art (at the time) automatic speech recognition system for Danish.

professional.title: Research Assistant
professional.subtitle: Technical University of Denmark
professional.description: Open-sourcing of DanSpeech and our DeepSpeech 2 Automatic Speech Recognition models for Danish. Furthermore, I conducted multiple experiments such as multilingual Automatic Speech Recognition, distillation of large deep learning models and Unidirectional Automatic Speech Recognition models for real time inference.

professional.title: IT Consultant
professional.subtitle: Netcompany
professional.description: Software development as an IT consultant on various projects ranging from 5-100+ participants. I worked on projects concerned with validating, enriching, processing and storing data in various ways and I enjoyed working with a great variety of technologies.

professional.title: DanSpeech project gets initial funding
professional.subtitle: DanSpeech pre-company
professional.description: Attended meetings with stakeholders and began prototyping various systems based on speech recognition technology for gaining business critical insights from speech. This was done in my spare time while working as an IT consultant.

professional.title: DanSpeech project gets InnoExplorer funding
professional.subtitle: DanSpeech pre-company
professional.description: With the InnoExplorer funding, I start working in DanSpeech full-time. Some highlights include creating state-of-the-art speech recognition models, initial development of our speech recognition platform ameya, research together with stakeholders and various data pipelines to improve machine learning models.

professional.title: My status changes to Married
professional.description: I got married to my beautiful wife Karen! ;-)

professional.title: Chief Technical Officer and Co-founder
professional.subtitle: Alvenir
professional.description: I Co-founded Alvenir together with a DTU Professor, two angel investors and a Partner. I maintained a great variety of tasks such as training state-of-the-art machine learning models, managing machine learning models in production, data analysis tasks and software development of our speech recognition platform Ameya; a cloud platform for speech recognition with horizontal scaling, multiple languages and customizable inference pipelines with multiple task specific modules.

professional.title: Board Bember
professional.subtitle: Alvenir
professional.description: I decided to transition to a board member role in August, where I advise Alvenir on software architecture, infrastructure, data pipelines, training of machine learning models, MLOps and strategic technical goals.

professional.title: My son was born in August
professional.description: And his first two books were Neural Networks for Babies and Bayesian Probability for Babies.

professional.title: Looking for new opportunities as a Data Scientist / Machine Learning Engineer
professional.description: I'm a young, passionate and skillful programmer looking for the right company. I bring a huge amount of machine learning knowledge which includes knowledge about MLOps. I value exciting and challenging problems, flexibility and work-life balance.
